Zanni, A. (n.d.). The LaZagne Project !!!. Retrieved December 14, 2018.

description: [LaZagne](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0349) can use the `<PID>/maps` and `<PID>/mem` files to identify regex patterns to dump cleartext passwords from the browser's process memory.(Citation: GitHub LaZagne Dec 2018)(Citation: Picus Labs Proc cump 2022)
